products.product_description: Released 2018, March, 163g, 8.5mm thickness, Android 8.0, 64/128/256GB storage, microSD card slot
Released 2016, September, 188g, 7.3mm thickness, iOS 10.0.1, up to iOS 12, 32/128/256GB storage, no card slot
Released 2017, September, 165g, 7.3mm thickness, Android 7.1.2, 64GB storage, microSD card slot
Released 2015, November, 192g, 9.4mm thickness, Android 5.1.1, up to 6.0.1, 32GB storage, microSD card slot
Released 2018, June, 168g, 8.5mm thickness, Android 8.1, 64/128GB storage, microSD card slot
Released 2018, October, 194g, 8.3mm thickness, iOS 12, 64/128/256GB storage, no card slot
Exp. release 2018, November 185g, 8.2mm thickness Android 9.0 256GB storage, no card slot
